column3: was the title and surname given to [[Manwë]]<ref>{{S|Vala}}</ref> the chief of the [[Valar]]
column4: master of the airs and lord of birds
column5: especially [[Eagles]]. The [[Elvish]] root-word [[sûl]] that appears in this name literally means 'breath'
column6: but is also used in connection with wind and weather. For example
column7: the [[Elvish]] name for the hill [[Weathertop]] was '[[Weathertop|Amon Sûl]]'.<ref>{{S|Index}}
